content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with a furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; holds fuel {'coal': 2}, furnace_result with 6 copper plates, energy 1600.0, and status: NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}; status: NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 12696.
- ElectricityGroup with id=12696 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); warnings include “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections”.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 199.97 units of water at 15°C; status: NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel”, connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and updated fluid_systems [47580].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box containing around 99.88 units of water at 15°C; status: WORKING, connection point (-9.5, 23.5), and fluid_systems [47580].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47580 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47581 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47582 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47587 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47586 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47591 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47590 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=47593 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures due to Outdated Fluid System Identifiers:
  • The agent repeatedly attempted pipeline connections using fluid_system values 47236, 47279, 47322, 47365, 47408, 47451, 47494, and 47537 without finding a matching working PipeGroup.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify the active fluid_system from the boiler’s updated fluid_systems and pipeline network configuration before attempting a connection.

- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Relying on preset fluid system identifiers led to multiple aborted connection attempts.
  • Tip: Derive and validate the current network’s fluid system configuration at runtime to ensure correct connection parameters.

- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, preventing effective steam generation.
  • Tip: Continuously monitor and replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory to maintain continuous operation.
